resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104180</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104180</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206569</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A New Lease on Life</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine neue Miete auf dem Leben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un nouveau bail la vie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um aluguer novo na vida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un nuovo contratto d'affitto su vita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια νέα μίσθωση στη ζωή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un nuevo arriendo el vida</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">explains how objects such as a letter written by Abe Lincoln and a dress worn by Lady Bird Johnson's are preserved to ensure safety while on exhibit in a museum. The site looks at steps taken by conservators to preserve objects, including examination, stabilization, research, and restoration.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erklärt, wie Nachrichten wie ein Brief, der von 
Abe Lincoln und ein Kleid getragen wird von der Dame Bird Johnsons 
geschrieben wird, konserviert werden, um Sicherheit während auf 
Ausstellung in einem Museum sicherzustellen. Die Site betrachtet
die Jobsteps, die durch Ausdehnungsgefäße zu den 
Konservenachrichten, einschließlich Prüfung, Ausgleichung, Forschung
und Wiederherstellung unternommen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">explique comment des objets tels qu'une lettre 
écrite par Abe Lincoln et une robe portée par Madame Bird Johnson
sont préservés pour assurer la sûreté tandis que sur l'objet 
exposé dans un musée. Le site regarde des étapes prises par 
des conservateurs aux objets de conserve, y compris l'examen, la 
stabilisation, la recherche, et la restauration.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">explica como os objetos tais como uma letra escrita
por Abe Lincoln e um vestido desgastado pela senhora Pássaro Johnson 
forem preservados para assegurar a segurança quando na exibição em 
um museu. O local olha as etapas feitas exame por conservators 
aos objetos do preserve, including a examinação, a estabilização, 
a pesquisa, e a restauração.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spiega come gli oggetti quale una lettera scritta 
da Abe Lincoln e un vestito portato dalla signora Bird Johnson sono 
conservati per accertare la sicurezza mentre sull'esposizione in un 
museo. Il luogo guarda i punti presi dai conservatori agli 
oggetti della conserva, compreso esame, stabilizzazione, ricerca e 
ripristino.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξηγεί πώς τα αντικείμενα όπως μια επιστολή που 
γράφονται από Abe Λίνκολν και ένα φόρεμα που φοριέται από 
την κυρία Bird Johnson's συντηρούνται για να εξασφαλίσουν 
ασφάλεια ενώ στο έκθεμα σε ένα μουσείο. Η περιοχή 
εξετάζει μέτρα που λαμβάνονται από conservators για να 
συντηρήσουν τα αντικείμενα, συμπεριλαμβανομένης της εξέτασης, της 
σταθεροποίησης, της έρευνας, και της αποκατάστασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">explica cómo los objetos tales como una letra 
escrita por Abe Lincoln y una alineada desgastada por señora Bird 
Johnson se preservan para asegurar seguridad mientras que en objeto 
expuesto en un museo. El sitio mira los pasos de progresión 
tomados por los conservadores a los objetos del coto, incluyendo la 
examinación, la estabilización, la investigación, y la 
restauración.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206569</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104180</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/a-new-lease-on-life</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
